MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G46 postcode area of Glasgow. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 5:58pm due to faulty electrical equipment on Maryville Avenue and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:10pm on Saturday, 24 April 2021
